languages.text: "О дне, когда Лорд-капитан забрел{mf||а} в наши трущобы, сложат легенды". {n}Широкий в плечах мужчина приветственно поднимает ладонь.{/n}

"The day the Lord Captain wandered into our slum will be remembered in legends." {n}The broad-shouldered man raises a hand in greeting. His old prosthetic creaks plaintively as it takes the weight of his body.{/n}
languages.original_text: "О дне, когда Лорд-капитан забрел{mf||а} в наши трущобы, сложат легенды". {n}Широкий в плечах мужчина приветственно поднимает ладонь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The day the Lord Captain wandered into our slum will go down in legends." {n}The broad-shouldered man raises his hand in greeting.{/n}
"The day the Lord Captain wandered into our slum will go down in legends." {n}The broad-shouldered man raises his hand in greeting.{/n}
"The day the Lord Captain wandered into our slum will be remembered in legends." {n}The broad-shouldered man raises a hand in greeting.{/n}

"The day the Lord Captain wandered into our slum will be remembered in legends." {n}The broad-shouldered man raises a hand in greeting. His old prosthetic creaks plaintively as it takes the weight of his body.{/n}

"The day the Lord Captain wandered into our slum will be remembered in legends." {n}The broad-shouldered man raises a hand in greeting. His old prosthetic creaks plaintively as it takes the weight of his body.{/n}

languages.text: «El día en que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán visitó nuestro suburbio se recordará como una leyenda». {n}El hombre de hombros anchos te saluda con una mano. Su vieja prótesis cruje lastimera al soportar el peso de su cuerpo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The day the Lord Captain wandered into our slum will be remembered in legends." {n}The broad-shouldered man raises a hand in greeting. His old prosthetic creaks plaintively as it takes the weight of his body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «El día en que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán visitó nuestro suburbio se recordará como una leyenda». {n}El hombre de hombros anchos te saluda con una mano. Su vieja prótesis cruje lastimera al soportar el peso de su cuerpo.{/n}

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテンがこのスラム街に足を踏み入れられた日は、伝説として語り継がれるだろう」{n}肩幅の広い男が手を上げて挨拶する。彼の古い義足は、体の重みに耐えかねるように、悲しげなきしみを上げる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The day the Lord Captain wandered into our slum will be remembered in legends." {n}The broad-shouldered man raises a hand in greeting. His old prosthetic creaks plaintively as it takes the weight of his body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテンがこのスラム街に足を踏み入れられた日は、伝説として語り継がれるだろう」{n}肩幅の広い男が手を上げて挨拶する。彼の古い義足は、体の重みに耐えかねるように、悲しげなきしみを上げる。{/n}

languages.text: “舰长大人亲自来到了贫民窟，这样的传奇故事一定会被所有人铭记在心。”{n}这个宽肩膀的人朝你举手致意。他破旧的假肢承受着身体的重压，发出了哀怨的咯吱声。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The day the Lord Captain wandered into our slum will be remembered in legends." {n}The broad-shouldered man raises a hand in greeting. His old prosthetic creaks plaintively as it takes the weight of his body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人亲自来到了贫民窟，这样的传奇故事一定会被所有人铭记在心。”{n}这个宽肩膀的人朝你举手致意。他破旧的假肢承受着身体的重压，发出了哀怨的咯吱声。{/n}

languages.text: "Der Tag, an dem der Lord Captain in unseren Slum kam, wird in die Legenden eingehen." {n}Der breitschultrige Mann erhebt die Hand zum Gruß. Seine alte Prothese knarzt klagend, als sie das Gewicht seines Körpers tragen muss.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The day the Lord Captain wandered into our slum will be remembered in legends." {n}The broad-shouldered man raises a hand in greeting. His old prosthetic creaks plaintively as it takes the weight of his body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Der Tag, an dem der Lord Captain in unseren Slum kam, wird in die Legenden eingehen." {n}Der breitschultrige Mann erhebt die Hand zum Gruß. Seine alte Prothese knarzt klagend, als sie das Gewicht seines Körpers tragen muss.{/n}

languages.text: « Le jour où {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a rendu visite à notre quartier restera dans les annales. » {n}L'homme aux larges épaules lève la main en guise de salut, pesant de tout son poids sur sa vieille prothèse qui en grince de protestation.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The day the Lord Captain wandered into our slum will be remembered in legends." {n}The broad-shouldered man raises a hand in greeting. His old prosthetic creaks plaintively as it takes the weight of his body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Le jour où {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a rendu visite à notre quartier restera dans les annales. » {n}L'homme aux larges épaules lève la main en guise de salut, pesant de tout son poids sur sa vieille prothèse qui en grince de protestation.{/n}

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan'ın kenar mahallemizde gezintiye çıktığı gün, efsanelerde hatırlanacak." {n}Geniş omuzlu adam, elini kaldırarak selam veriyor. Eski püskü protezi, âdeta bedeninin tüm ağırlığını çekiyormuşçasına hüzünle gıcırdıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The day the Lord Captain wandered into our slum will be remembered in legends." {n}The broad-shouldered man raises a hand in greeting. His old prosthetic creaks plaintively as it takes the weight of his body.{/n}
